column4: Hi there, got a client pc that wont connect to a wireless device. It list is, it will connect to another one, but it wont connect to this one and another one. Latest version of Ubuntu, are there any logs I can check to try and work out the problem?
Does it make a difference if you try the same encryption type of one of the working APs on the non-working one?
shouldnt it just automatically pick the correct type?
Well some wifi chips/drivers dont support WPA while WEP works for instance
